content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
Everyday I meet my boyfriend, I feel I am in a black hole. He is too demanding and keeps an eye on my life.
I' m sorry to hear that. Do you feel as though you are being ignored because you think that this guy is the one?
I don't think I am ignored. Conversely, I am over-controlled.
I can imagine how this must feel. I have been in a similar situation and it' s not easy. Have you spoken to your boyfriend about this?
